attributes.action: force Marion Nicolson to get a Bebo page!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As you know, everyone is getting involved in the new craze sweeping the nation. The one known absentee is a certain Marion Nicolson from Portree. We the undersigned would like to see her get one at the nearest possible convenience so that we can swap witty anecdotes and laugh at each others pictures.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
